healthbR — Project Status

Source: STATUS.md

Last updated: 2026-02-11
Current version: 0.5.0 (development)
CRAN version: 0.1.1 (submitted 2026-02-04)

Overview

healthbR is an R package that provides unified, tidy access to Brazilian public health data from multiple government sources (Ministry of Health, DATASUS, IBGE). It currently exports 65 functions across 8 data modules, with compiled C code for reading proprietary DATASUS .dbc files.

  • Repository: https://github.com/SidneyBissoli/healthbR
  • License: MIT
  • R version: >= 4.2.0

Module Status

Module Data source Coverage Status Tests
VIGITEL Min. Saude (CSV/Stata) 2006–2024 Complete Unit
PNS IBGE FTP + SIDRA API 2013, 2019 Complete Unit (2 known failures)
PNADC IBGE FTP Multiple supplements Complete Unit
POF IBGE FTP 2002-03, 2008-09, 2017-18 Complete Unit
Censo IBGE SIDRA API 1970–2022 + estimates Complete 62 unit + 11 integration
SIM DATASUS FTP (.dbc) 1996–2024 (CID-10) Complete 76 unit + 7 integration
SINASC DATASUS FTP (.dbc) 1996–2024 Complete 77 unit + 5 integration
SIH DATASUS FTP (.dbc) 2008–2024 (monthly) Complete 104 unit + 5 integration

All modules follow a consistent API pattern: <module>_years(), <module>_info(), <module>_variables(), <module>_dictionary(), <module>_data(), <module>_cache_status(), <module>_clear_cache().

Release History

v0.1.0 — Initial release

  • VIGITEL module with parquet caching, parallel downloads, and lazy evaluation via Arrow.

v0.1.1 — CRAN compliance

  • Moved arrow from Imports to Suggests.
  • Added cache_dir parameter to all functions; examples use tempdir().

v0.2.0 — Multi-source expansion

  • Breaking: VIGITEL refactored for new Ministry of Health data structure (single consolidated file).
  • Added PNS, PNADC, POF, and Censo modules.
  • Shared SIDRA API utilities extracted to utils-sidra.R.
  • Two new vignettes (POF, Censo).

v0.5.0 (current, unreleased) — SIH

  • Added SIH hospital admission module with monthly data (one .dbc per UF per month).
  • month parameter for selecting specific months; diagnosis filter for CID-10 codes.
  • Output includes year, month, and uf_source columns.

v0.4.0 — SINASC

  • Added SINASC live birth module with per-state downloads and congenital anomaly filtering.
  • Reuses shared DBC infrastructure from v0.3.0.

v0.3.0 — DBC infrastructure + SIM

  • Vendored C code for .dbc decompression (blast.c, dbc2dbf.c).
  • Added SIM mortality module with per-state downloads, age decoding, and CID-10 filtering.
  • Added foreign to Imports.

Project Structure

healthbR/
├── R/                          # 16 source files
│   ├── vigitel.R               # VIGITEL module
│   ├── pns.R                   # PNS module
│   ├── pnadc.R                 # PNADC module
│   ├── pof.R                   # POF module
│   ├── censo.R                 # Censo module
│   ├── sim.R                   # SIM module (public API)
│   ├── sim_data_internal.R     # SIM internal helpers
│   ├── sinasc.R                # SINASC module (public API)
│   ├── sinasc_data_internal.R  # SINASC internal helpers
│   ├── sih.R                   # SIH module (public API)
│   ├── sih_data_internal.R     # SIH internal helpers
│   ├── dbc_infrastructure.R    # Shared DBC read/download functions
│   ├── utils.R                 # General utilities
│   ├── utils-sidra.R           # Shared SIDRA API utilities (PNS + Censo)
│   ├── healthbR-package.R      # Package-level documentation
│   └── zzz.R                   # .onAttach hook
├── src/                        # Compiled C code
│   ├── blast.c / blast.h       # PKWare DCL decompressor (zlib license)
│   ├── dbc2dbf.c               # DBC-to-DBF wrapper (MIT)
│   └── init.c                  # C routine registration
├── tests/testthat/             # 11 test files + helper
├── man/                        # 76 roxygen2-generated man pages
├── vignettes/                  # 3 vignettes
│   ├── healthbR.Rmd            # Introduction
│   ├── pof-health-data.Rmd     # POF analysis guide
│   └── censo-denominadores.Rmd # Census denominators guide
└── .github/workflows/
    └── rhub.yaml               # R-hub multi-platform CI

Dependencies

Imports (required)

tibble, dplyr, readxl, curl, cli, rlang, stringr, janitor, purrr, haven, readr, jsonlite, foreign

Suggests (optional)

testthat (>= 3.0.0), knitr, rmarkdown, furrr, future, arrow, survey, srvyr

Shared Infrastructure

DBC decompression (C)

Reads DATASUS .dbc files (PKWare DCL–compressed DBF). Vendored from Mark Adler’s blast.c (zlib license) with a custom dbc2dbf.c wrapper. Internal R functions: .dbc2dbf(), .read_dbc(), .datasus_download(). Enables all current and future DATASUS-based modules.

SIDRA API utilities

Generic query, URL building, and response cleaning for IBGE’s SIDRA API. Located in R/utils-sidra.R, shared by PNS and Censo modules.

Caching strategy

Parquet-partitioned caching when arrow is installed; .rds fallback otherwise. Cache location: tools::R_user_dir("healthbR", "cache"). Each module exposes *_cache_status() and *_clear_cache().

CI/CD

  • R-hub: .github/workflows/rhub.yaml — multi-platform R CMD check on push/PR.
  • Integration tests: gated behind HEALTHBR_INTEGRATION environment variable and skip_on_cran() / skip_if_offline().

Known Issues

Issue Affected module Workaround
iconv(x, to = "ASCII//TRANSLIT") segfaults on Windows R All (encoding) Use chartr() for accent removal
utils::unzip() fails with Portuguese filenames on Windows POF PowerShell Expand-Archive fallback
dplyr column name shadows function parameter POF, SIM Base R subsetting instead of dplyr::filter()
PNS has 2 pre-existing test failures PNS Documented, does not block releases

Metrics

Metric Value

Test files 11
Exported functions 65

Complete modules 8

Roadmap

The DBC infrastructure added in v0.3.0 enables future DATASUS modules:

  • SIA — Ambulatory Information System
  • CNES — Health Establishments Registry
  • SINAN — Notifiable Diseases Information System
